pr_title: [ML] Remove unused member var from ExtractedFieldsDetector

timeline.message:
[ML] Remove unused member var from ExtractedFieldsDetector

Removes member variable `index` from `ExtractedFieldsDetector`
as it is not used.

timeline.bodyText: Is it now possible to remove SOURCE_INDEX constant? Or is it still used?
timeline.author: przemekwitek

replies.bodyText: still used when we create the job configs
replies.author: dimitris-athanasiou
